step1.title: Connect Store Ads
step1.description: Link Google Ads. We automatically detect your Shopping campaigns and Merchant Center feeds.

step2.title: Choose Ecom Layout
step2.description: Select the 'ROAS Focus' template. It prioritizes Revenue, Cart Value, and Cost of Sale over vanity metrics.

step3.title: Visualize Products
step3.description: See which products are your winners and losers. Drill down by Brand, Category, or Item ID.

step4.title: Scale Winners
step4.description: Use the insights to kill wasting ad sets and double down on profitable products immediately.

automation.title: Daily Morning Recap
automation.description: Wake up to an email showing exactly how much you spent and made yesterday. Start your day knowing your numbers.

realtime.title: Black Friday Ready
realtime.description: During peak season, you need live data. Watch your hourly spend vs revenue to maximize big sale days.

design.title: Investor Ready
design.description: Need to show numbers to investors or partners? Our professional financial visuals build confidence.

whitelabel.title: Custom Domain
whitelabel.description: Host your dashboard at metrics.yourstore.com. Keep your data professional and branded.

multidevice.title: Check on the Go
multidevice.description: Shopify notification popped up? Check the ad cost for that sale instantly on your phone.

support.title: Ecom Data Experts
support.description: We understand Merchant Center errors and conversion value lag. Our support speaks e-commerce.

ecommerce.title: Performance Max Analysis
ecommerce.description: Crack the black box. See asset group performance and listing group insights for PMax campaigns.

leadgen.title: High-Ticket Sales
leadgen.description: For stores with high AOV ($500+). Track long sales cycles and assisted conversions.

agency.title: Dropshipping Testing
agency.description: Rapidly test products. Visualization of daily profitability per product to find winners fast.

local.title: Omnichannel Retail
local.description: Combine online sales with 'Store Visits' metrics to see total impact of ads on revenue.

saas.title: Subscription Box
saas.description: Track CAC vs LTV context. Understand front-end profitability vs back-end lifetime value.

tip1.title: Track Search Impression Share
tip1.description: Are your competitors outbidding you on your own brand name? Monitor Brand Search IS closely.

tip2.title: Monitor Product Hygiene
tip2.description: Keep an eye on 'Products Ready to Serve'. If this drops, you are missing potential sales due to feed errors.

tip3.title: Breakdown by Category
tip3.description: Don't look at blended ROAS only. Maybe Shoes are profitable but Socks are losing money. Segment!

tip4.title: Watch the 'Time Lag'
tip4.description: Don't pause a campaign after 1 day if your average customer takes 14 days to buy. Check the lag report.

tip5.title: Optimize for Margin, Not Revenue
tip5.description: High ROAS doesn't mean high profit if you sell low-margin items. Know your break-even ROAS.

tip6.title: Use Custom Labels
tip6.description: Group products by margin (High/Low) or Season (Winter/Summer) in your feed, then report on these labels in Flipika.

tip7.title: Mobile Speed Matters
tip7.description: If mobile traffic has high Bounce Rate, your site is too slow. Fix it, or stop buying mobile traffic.

faq.a1: Yes, if your Google Ads sends data to your Shopify store (which it should), Flipika tracks the results perfectly.
faq.q2: Can I see profit, not just revenue?
faq.a2: Currently we pull 'Conversion Value' from Google Ads. If you pass profit margin data to Google, we can display it.
faq.a3: Yes, we have full support for PMax campaigns, asset groups, and listing groups reporting.
faq.a4: Hourly. Essential for Flash Sales or Black Friday monitoring.
faq.q5: Can I filter by product type?
faq.a5: Yes, our interactive tables allow filtering by Campaign, Ad Group, or Item ID.
faq.a6: Perfect for it. Quick clarity on what's working so you can kill bad ads fast.
faq.q7: What if I have multiple stores?
faq.a7: Toggle between store accounts in one click, or use our Agency view to see them side-by-side.
faq.a8: None. If you can log into Google, you can use Flipika. It's plug-and-play.
